about_the_game:
Path of Kingdoms is a strategy game where the player must defeat all the factions of the kingdom to reach the goal, each faction has a story that evolves as it conquers territories through narrated interlude scenes.

  • 6 different factions, each faction having completely different gameplay characteristics that make the gaming experience very different (not only the difficulty level).
  • Each faction's units have completely different characteristics such as endurance, speed, strength, etc..
  • Each battle, even if the scenery is similar, is unique: there are over 100 parameters that customise the combat environments: position and type of enemy units, weather, additional animals, wind, grass, stones... characteristics that change the combat strategy in each battle.
  • The evolution of the map, which adapts with the player, changes with each game.
  • Different combat units: light infantry, scouts, heavy infantry, cavalry, archers, sorcerers, catapults.
  • Different types of battle: kill enemies, liberate villages, besiege towns, defend villages, resist enemy assault, ...
  • Enemy AI that evolves with the player: prepare assaults, encirclement strategies, traps, ...

Battle Mode.
  • Kill all enemies
  • Clear territories
  • Kill all enemies in a preset time
  • Defend territories
